name: Beholder
pages: A Beholder is a large aberration that spawns in the deep depths of the Underworld or in the Nether. They are powerful magic users and have a formidable bite. Beholders and their kin tend to stay away from their opponents, relying on their magic and minions to battle their foes.

$(l)Number$(): 1$(br)$(l)Size$(): Large$(br)$(l)Level$(): Mini Boss$(br)$(l)Rarity$(): Rare$(br)$(l)Movement$(): Flies/Hovers$(br)$(l)Speed$(): Normal$(br)$(l)Health$(): 36hp$(br)$(l)Damage/Strength$(): 8hp$(br)$(l)Daylight$(): Yes$(br)$(l)Despawn$(): Yes$(br)$(l)Spawns$(): Underworld, Nether

$(l)Weapons/Specials$():$(br)- Randomly casts one of four spells: $(l:paralysis)Paralysis$(), $(l:harm)Harm$(), $(l:disintegrate)Disintegrate$() and $(l:disarm)Disarm$().$(br)- Can summon one minion at a time: $(l:headless)Headless$(), $(l:orc)Orc$(), $(l:spectator)Spectator$(), or Blaze.$(br)- Has a small chance to summon a $(l:daemon)Daemon$().
